tool_description: Tracks and analyzes customer satisfaction with shipping services, correlating feedback with delivery performance.

delivery_data_id.description: Reference ID for delivery performance data

correlation_analysis.description: Whether to perform correlation analysis with performance metrics

error_messages: Invalid delivery data ID: The provided data reference cannot be found or has expired.
Feedback source unavailable: One or more specified feedback sources cannot be accessed.
Insufficient feedback data: Not enough customer feedback available for meaningful analysis.
Invalid satisfaction metric: Supported metrics include overall_rating, delivery_speed, packaging_quality, tracking_accuracy.
usage: Provide delivery_data_id and specify feedback_sources. Optionally select satisfaction_metrics and enable correlation_analysis for deeper insights.

satisfaction_scores.description: Customer satisfaction scores by carrier and metric

feedback_trends.description: Trends in customer satisfaction over time

correlation_insights.description: Insights from correlation analysis between satisfaction and performance
